00084         //  Loop through columns and generate a form
00085         foreach ( $columns as $_sName => $_oColumn )
00086         {
00087             //  Try to ignore some non-display columns. You can remove or augment as desired
00088             if ( in_array( $_sName, array( 'create_date', 'lmod_date', 'create_user_id', 'lmod_user_id', 'created', 'date_created', 'modified', 'date_modified' ) ) )
00089                 continue;
00090 
00091             //  Build the form
00092             if ( $_oColumn->type === 'boolean' )
00093                 $_sType = "array( PS::CHECK, '{$_oColumn->name}' )";
00094             else if ( stripos( $_oColumn->dbType, 'text' ) !== false )
00095                 $_sType = "array( PS::TEXTAREA, '{$_oColumn->name}', array( 'rows' => 6, 'cols' => 50 ) )";
00096             else
00097             {
00098                 //  Try to distinguish password fields from text fields
00099                 $_sField = ( preg_match( '/^(password|pass|passwd|passcode)$/i', $_oColumn->name ) ) ? 'PS::PASSWORD' : 'PS::TEXT';
00100 
00101                 if ( $_oColumn->type !== 'string' || $_oColumn->size === null )
00102                     $_sType = "array( {$_sField}, '{$_oColumn->name}' )";
00103                 else
00104                 {
00105                     //  Assume tinyint/bools are on/off or yes/no...
00106                     if ( $_oColumn->type == 'int' && $_oColumn->size == 1 )
00107                     {
00108                         $_sType = "array( PS::DD_YES_NO, '{$_oColumn->name}' )";
00109                     }
00110                     //  Assume "code" db domain is dropdown, you can set the data type
00111                     else if ( preg_match( '/(.*)+_code/i', $_oColumn->name ) )
00112                     {
00113                         $_sType = "array( PS::DROPDOWN, '{$_oColumn->name}', array( 'data' => array() ) )";
00114                     }
00115                     //  Don't make fields over 60 chars wide
00116                     else if ( ( $size = $maxLength = $_oColumn->size ) > 60 ) 
00117                         $size = 60;
00118 
00119                     //  Generate the field
00120                     $_sType = "\t\tarray( {$_sField}, '{$_oColumn->name}', array( 'size' => {$size}, 'maxlength' => {$maxLength} ) )";
00121                 }
00122
